name: HealingSounds
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: healing sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Healing Sounds is an Alexa skill designed to help you unwind and de-stress whenever you need it. With a wide range of calming sounds, including nature sounds, white noise, and ambient music, you can find the perfect soundscape to suit your mood. Whether you're trying to meditate, focus, or simply escape from the distractions of daily life.



To add this skill to your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.

On the Alexa app, navigate to Routines.

Click + to add a new routine.

Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.

Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".

Choose "Your Skills".

Select this skill.

Click Next.

Choose the Device to perform the routine.

Click Save.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
